item.title: Unconditional love...
item.description: To say, it is a love without any strings attached and selfless. It is about acceptance. It doesn’t associate with outward appearance, supports the other person by always being there and doesn’t go away even when circumstances are bad or difficult. item.title: Friend, What comes to your mind, When you hear this word?
item.description: One line would be someone whom we are fond of talking to or spending time with.
